property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: Field is Required. Write object Api name. like - Account, customobject__c

property.name: keyFieldAPI
property.label: Field Api(value will be returned)
property.description: Field is Required. Field API which will be set when user select value, for eg - ID, ExternalID

property.name: searchField
property.label: Search Field API
property.description: Field is Required. This field is used to set the label of returned value after search ex - Name

property.name: isRequired
property.label: Required
property.description: Set Global constant True or False, By default it is false.

property.name: predefinedId
property.label: Selected Record Id
property.description: Set Record Id that will be pre populate on the component.
